description: This file defines a React functional component named Tutorials that displays interactive tutorial steps with navigation controls. It uses a custom hook useGameStore to access the current tutorial state and functions to navigate between steps.

methods.name: Tutorials()
methods.description: React functional component that renders tutorial steps and navigation buttons.

calls: useGameStore(s => ({ tutorial: s.tutorial, nextTutorial: s.nextTutorial, prevTutorial: s.prevTutorial }))
